articles.title: Japan city loses memory drive with data of all 460000 residents - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Lost info includes bank account details, although Amagasaki says no leakage yet
articles.content:
KOBE (Kyodo) -- The western Japan city of Amagasaki said Thursday it has lost a USB flash drive containing personal information on all of its roughly 460,000 residents.
